video

Plug the numbers into the expressions.


  1. Lower bound = \(~0.5144-2\sqrt{\frac{(0.5144)(1-0.5144)}{243}} ~=~ 0.4502766\)
  2. Upper bound = \(~0.5144+2\sqrt{\frac{(0.5144)(1-0.5144)}{243}} ~=~ 0.5785234\)
